relevant_findings.neurologic_exam: Appeared somnolent and mildly difficult to arouse, fussy but consolable; normal neurologic examination between episodes.
relevant_findings.abdominal_exam: No evidence of an acute abdomen.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Lethargy increased, with episodes of unresponsiveness lasting longer, progressing from 2-3 seconds to 30-60 seconds.
